name: Baby & Animal Vision
description:
Have you ever wondered how babies see during the first months of their lives? How cats, dogs or other animals see the world? It’s time to find out! Baby & Animal Vision uses your camera and simulates how the world would look like through the eyes of a newborn baby and various animals.

FEATURES

- vision of a baby during the first six months of his/her life
- 11 animal vision simulations
- 2 lens vision simulations
- Endless fun for you and your kids
